summary: In sprint planning, Mike notes that backlog items are in draft status and proposes using the sprint to prioritize, review, and approve 2-3 core MVP stories like US-007 (authentication) and US-001 (Employee Directory) to unblock development, seeking client approval.

actions.task: Prioritize, review, and approve 2-3 core MVP stories (e.g., US-007, US-001)

backlog_deltas.title: Refine and approve authentication story for sprint
Refine and approve Employee Directory story for sprint

risks.risk: Backlog items in draft status blocking execution
risks.mitigation: Use sprint for refinement and approval of foundational stories
